attributes.action: Make Saint George’s Day a bank holiday in Great Britain
attributes.additional_details: This would show the people of the country that the government shares the British people there patriotism for our country . This would also boost morale amongst the population
attributes.background: I would like the government to make Saint George’s Day a UK bank holiday . As other countries in the world Celebrate there patriotism to there Saints with a Bank Holiday I think the UK should as well

rejection.details:
Make St George’s Day a Bank Holiday for people in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739078
